properties.entry: SELECT CALL_NO, TOPIC, BOOK_NAME, AUTHOR, PUBLISHER, LOC, AVAIL, NVL(TO_CHAR(DUE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'-') DUE_DATE FROM TB_BOOKS JOIN TB_TOPIC USING (TOPIC_CODE) JOIN TB_LOCATION USING (LOC_CODE) JOIN TB_AVAILABILITY USING (AVAIL_CODE) WHERE BOOK_NAME = ? OR AUTHOR = ? OR PUBLISHER = ?
